items.name: Apollyon
items.instructions:
## What it is
- A playable character.

## How unlocking works
- Unlocks are per save file.
- Once unlocked, this character appears on the character select screen.

## Step-by-step
- Follow this character’s specific unlock condition (varies by character).
- After unlocking, pick the character and start marking off boss/end-route completions.

## Tips
- If you're learning, focus on one character at a time and aim for consistent route clears.

items.name: The Forgotten
items.instructions:
## Goal
- Unlock **The Forgotten**.

## Requirements
- Access to Boss Rush (needs Mom killed fast enough).
- Survive while being chased by stomps after starting the quest.

## Step-by-step from a fresh run
- On Floor 1, beat the boss in under 1 minute.
- Return to the starting room and bomb the centre to reveal the shovel piece.
- Pick up the quest item (you’ll be chased by stomps).
- Reach and complete Boss Rush while carrying it.
- Finish the sequence in the Dark Room to unlock **The Forgotten**.

## Tips
- Bring mobility and defensive items. The stomps do not negotiate.

items.name: The Lost
items.instructions:
## Goal
- Unlock **The Lost**.

## Requirement
- You need **Missing Poster**.

## Step-by-step from a fresh run
- Get **Missing Poster**.
- Find a Sacrifice Room.
- Die on the spikes while holding Missing Poster.
- You unlock **The Lost**.

items.name: Baby Plum
items.instructions:
## What it is
- A floor boss. Defeat it to clear the floor and open the exit.

## How to reach it
- Play a normal run and explore the floor until you find the boss door.
- Make sure you are ready (HP, bombs/keys, and a usable build) before you enter.

## Where it appears
- Appears in: Chapter 1
- Bosses are chosen from a chapter pool. You won't see the same one every run.

## Step-by-step
- Clear rooms to gain resources (keys, bombs, coins) and get stronger.
- Locate the boss door (usually after exploring most of the floor).
- Enter and learn the attack pattern. Prioritise dodging, then damage.
- After the kill, take the boss item reward and go to the next floor.

## Rewards & progress
- Boss item reward (most of the time).
- Clearing bosses advances your run toward endings/unlocks.

## New-ish player tips
- If you're struggling, focus on movement first. Surviving beats “one more hit”.
- Save bombs for big threats or secret rooms if your damage is low.

items.name: Mom
items.instructions:
## What it is
- A major end-route boss (one of the “big endings”).

## How to reach it
- This boss requires a specific route or set of conditions.
- Use the guide below, and follow prerequisites exactly.

## Step-by-step (high level)
- Reach the correct chapter via the correct route.
- Complete any required doors/keys/items on the way.
- Enter the boss area and defeat it to finish the route.

## Common pitfalls
- Missing a required door/room on an earlier floor.
- Taking the “normal” route when this boss needs an alternate path.
- Not having enough resources (keys/bombs) when the route demands them.

items.instructions: From a fresh run: reach The Void via a portal after certain bosses (commonly after Hush / Mega Satan / Chest / Dark Room) and beat Delirium.

items.name: Mother
items.instructions:
## Goal
- Beat **Mother** at the end of [[Corpse]].

## Requirements
- Access the alt path floors: [[Downpour/Dross]] → [[Mines/Ashpit]] → [[Mausoleum/Gehenna]] → [[Corpse]].
- Assemble the Knife: [[Knife Piece 1]] + [[Knife Piece 2]].

## Step-by-step from a fresh run
- After Chapter 1, take the door to [[Downpour/Dross]].
- Get [[Knife Piece 1]].
- Continue alt path into [[Mines/Ashpit]].
- Get [[Knife Piece 2]].
- Use the completed Knife to enter [[Mausoleum/Gehenna]].
- Finish Mausoleum and use the Knife door to enter [[Corpse]].
- Beat **Mother** at the end.

## Common gotchas
- This route is time-consuming. Don’t panic if it feels “different”, it is.

items.name: Dogma
items.instructions:
## Goal
- Beat **Dogma** on the Beast route.

## Requirements
- Start [[Ascent & Dad's Note]].
- Reach [[Home]].

## Step-by-step from a fresh run
- Get to Depths II and defeat Mom.
- Pick up **Dad’s Note** to begin [[Ascent & Dad's Note]].
- Keep ascending until you arrive at [[Home]].
- Proceed to trigger the **Dogma** fight.

## After Dogma
- You are locked into the Beast route leading to [[The Beast]].

items.name: The Ultra Harbingers
items.instructions:
## What it is
- A major end-route boss (one of the “big endings”).

## How to reach it
- This boss requires a specific route or set of conditions.
- Use the guide below, and follow prerequisites exactly.

## Step-by-step (high level)
- Reach the correct chapter via the correct route.
- Complete any required doors/keys/items on the way.
- Enter the boss area and defeat it to finish the route.

## Common pitfalls
- Missing a required door/room on an earlier floor.
- Taking the “normal” route when this boss needs an alternate path.
- Not having enough resources (keys/bombs) when the route demands them.

## Rewards & progress
- Completing this route usually unlocks content and/or marks completion for characters.

## Linked requirements
- If this entry mentions [[Something]] you can click it in the instructions to jump to that requirement.

items.name: The Beast
items.instructions:
## Goal
- Beat **The Beast**.

## Requirements
- Beat [[Dogma]].
- Defeat the Ultra Harbingers (post-Dogma sequence).

## Step-by-step from a fresh run
- Start [[Ascent & Dad's Note]].
- Reach [[Home]].
- Beat [[Dogma]].
- Defeat the Ultra Harbingers sequence.
- Beat **The Beast**.

items.name: Downpour/Dross
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Alternate Chapter 1.5 path.

## How to enter
- Beat the Chapter 1 boss.
- A door appears that leads to [[Downpour/Dross]] instead of the normal next floor.

## Why you care
- Needed for the [[Mother]] route (Knife Piece 1).

items.name: Mines/Ashpit
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Alternate Chapter 2.5 path.

## How to enter
- After [[Downpour/Dross]], take the alt-path door at the end of the chapter.

## Why you care
- Needed for the [[Mother]] route (Knife Piece 2).

items.name: Mausoleum/Gehenna
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Alternate Chapter 3.5 path.

## How to enter
- After [[Mines/Ashpit]], use the knife to pass the special door into Mausoleum.

## Why you care
- Required to reach [[Corpse]].

items.name: Knife Piece 1
items.instructions:
## How to get it
- Go to [[Downpour/Dross]].
- Find a white flame room and touch the flame.
- While in the special form, enter the mirror and complete the objective to grab **Knife Piece 1**.

## Why you care
- Combines with [[Knife Piece 2]] to form the Knife for the [[Mother]] route.

items.name: Knife Piece 2
items.instructions:
## How to get it
- Go to [[Mines/Ashpit]].
- Hit the button to start the chase sequence.
- Survive and reach the end to pick up **Knife Piece 2**.

## Why you care
- Combines with [[Knife Piece 1]] to form the Knife.

items.name: Corpse
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Final area of the alt path.

## How to reach
- Complete [[Mausoleum/Gehenna]].
- Use the Knife on the special door to enter [[Corpse]].

## End goal
- Beat [[Mother]].

items.name: Ascent & Dad's Note
items.instructions:
## How to start
- Reach Depths II.
- Defeat Mom.
- Pick up **Dad's Note**.

## What happens
- The run reverses and you ascend back up through earlier floors.

## End goal
- Reach [[Home]] for [[Dogma]] and [[The Beast]].

items.name: Home
items.instructions:
## How to reach
- Start [[Ascent & Dad's Note]].
- Keep climbing until you reach **Home**.

## What to do at Home
- Open Mom’s bedroom.
- (Optional) Open the closet as a character to unlock its tainted version.

## End goal
- Trigger [[Dogma]] and the Beast route.
